applet_name: Change the light to green if stock price rises enough
applet_description: This will automatically change the WiZ light(s) of your choice to green if the price of the stock you selected rises by more than a certain percentage compared to the last closing price. (Only for WiZ Colors lights)

applet_name: Change the light to red if stock price drops too much
applet_description: This will automatically change the WiZ light(s) of your choice to red whenever the price of the stock you have selected falls by more than a certain percentage compared to the previous closing price. (Only for WiZ Colors lights)
